steps.title: Add Life To Your Quotation
steps.content: This Button allows you to create a new Quotation, status as submitted, generated as per requirement/need of Lead/Customer of Company.

steps.title: Items Button
steps.content: This button, when clicked, shows below the list and information about Items required by Customer.

steps.title: Approve Button
steps.content: This button, when clicked, approves the Corresponding Quotation and places it in Approved Tab.

steps.title: Reject Button
steps.content: This button, when clicked, rejects the Corresponding Quotation with asking for feedback for cause of rejection and places it in Redesign Tab.

steps.title: Edit Button
steps.content: This button, when clicked, allows you to edit the current information about the corresponding Quotation.

steps.title: Delete Button
steps.content: This button, when clicked, deletes the corresponding Quotation from the records.
